articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: 'Greatest world has ever seen' - Williams tributes
articles.description: Tributes are paid to Serena Williams, who has played her final match as a tennis professional after a US Open third-round defeat.
articles.content:
Billie Jean King (left) was among the first to pay tribute to Williams
US Open 2022
Venue: Flushing Meadows, New York Dates: 29 August-11 September

articles.content:

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Mikhail Gorbachev: Last Soviet leader to be buried
articles.description: But President Putin will not be attending the funeral of the man who oversaw the breakup of the USSR.
articles.content:
Mikhail Gorbachev, the last Soviet leader who brought the Cold War to a peaceful end, will be buried in Moscow on Saturday - four days after he died.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US approves $1.1bn Taiwan arms sale, angering China
articles.description: China urged the US to revoke the deal to provide missiles and a radar system or face "counter-measures".
articles.content:
The US has agreed to sell $1.1bn (£955m) in weaponry to Taiwan, provoking anger from China. 
The proposed deal includes a radar system to track incoming strikes and anti-ship and anti-air missiles. … [+2532 chars]
